results.code:
422     
423     def create_jwt_token(
424         self,
425         user_id: str,
426         token_type: str = "access",
427         additional_claims: Dict[str, Any] = None
428     ) -> AuthToken:
429         """Create JWT token for user."""
430         
431         now = datetime.now(timezone.utc)
432         
433         if token_type == "access":
434             expire_delta = timedelta(minutes=self.jwt_access_token_expire)
435         elif token_type == "refresh":
436             expire_delta = timedelta(days=self.jwt_refresh_token_expire)
437         else:
438             expire_delta = timedelta(hours=1)
439         
440         expires_at = now + expire_delta
441         
442         payload = {
443             'sub': user_id,
444             'type': token_type,
445             'iat': now,
446             'exp': expires_at,
447             'iss': 'agentic-startup-studio',
448             'aud': 'agentic-startup-studio'
449         }
450         
451         if additional_claims:
452             payload.update(additional_claims)
453         
454         token = jwt.encode(payload, self.jwt_secret, algorithm=self.jwt_algorithm)
455         
456         return AuthToken(
457             token=token,
458             token_type=token_type,
459             user_id=user_id,
460             expires_at=expires_at,
461             scopes=additional_claims.get('scopes', []) if additional_claims else [],
462             metadata={'created_at': now.isoformat()}
463         )
464
